nodes.notes: This httpRequest node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## 1. Load the video page
Open this node and replace the URL with the one of the video you want to download without a watermark.

A Tiktok video URL looks like: {{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

Outputs the returned page HTML along with the session cookies

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## 2. Find the raw video URL
Parses through all of the HTML and finds the section containing the video URL before the watermark is applied

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## 3. Output video file without watermark
Using the cookies from step 1, a request is made to access the original video file as shown on TikTok

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Set file permissions to public with link
nodes.notes: This googleDrive node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
## (Optional) Upload video to Google Drive
An expression is used to save the file to your Google Drive as Video_ID.mp4

Note: Must have Google Drive API enabled in [Google Cloud Console]({{ $env.API_BASE_URL }} OAuth ClientID and Client Secret credentials setup

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Tiktok Downloader

## Overview
Automated workflow: Tiktok Downloader. This workflow integrates 6 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, code, googleDrive, stopAndError. It contains 16 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 16
- **Node Types**: 6
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Get TikTok Video Page Data**: httpRequest
- **Scrape raw video URL**: code
- **Output video file without watermark**: httpRequest
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Upload to Google Drive**: googleDrive
- **Set file permissions to public with link**: googleDrive
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- ... and 6 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
